The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
0123456789
Special: !@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':",.<>?/

Code sample:
    def hello_world():
        print("Hello, World!")
        return 42

Common OCR confusion pairs:
- rn vs m (modern → modem)
- l vs 1 vs I (Illuminate → I11uminate)
- O vs 0 (October → 0ctober)
- cl vs d (include → indude)
